description: An Aramaean principality and Neo-Assyrian provincial capital founded on the site of an extinct Neolithic settlement. Settled through Hellenistic times, it was abandoned at the end of the first century BCE.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Halaf, SYR
